product_name: K2 Slope Style Ski Poles - Women's
long_description: The K2 Slope Style Ski poles feature a full-length composite construction that's lightweight and durable. Hit the slopes with these performance-driven poles and conquer the mountain. Composite fiberglass construction aligns all fibers in shaft for optimal strength and durability. Grips are sized to fit small hands comfortably. Small baskets work well in most snow conditions, especially hardpack. The K2 Slope Style ski poles feature adjustable wrist straps.
short_description: The K2 Slope Style Ski poles feature a full-length composite construction that's lightweight and durable. Hit the slopes with these performance-driven poles and conquer the mountain.
